title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions & Transportation             There are nine main access points to Lake Mead National Recreation Area, 1.5 million acres which includes two lakes.   The Lake Mead Visitor Center is located off of U.S. 93, four miles southeast of Boulder City, Nevada. See the park maps below to find the route best for you.                      Park Map - Overview (PDF)         Park Map - Inside the Park (PDF)         Lake Mead NRA GPS Coordinates (PDF)      More Maps Available on Our Map Page
